name: Den Run
description:
GAMEPLAY :

"The Den Run" is a challenging game in which the player takes the role of a small baby who is wrongly enter to the cave and wants to come out from that cave. The object of the game is to run as far as possible avoiding randomly generated obstacles, that require the player to jump (slide finger upward). Jump the character allowing them to collect coins as they run. These coins are primarily in the shape of yellow gold coins, but according to use of power, they can also be red, blue,green (a 2-point coin). In addition to the coins, players also get bonus points during their run.

POWERUPS :

The coins the player collects in the game can be spent in the game's "Market". At the market, the player is able to purchase powers throughout the run, after purchase 4 powers , the player have to buy more powers by InApp purchase.

1. BONUS COINS : Collect this power and add more 200 bonus coins in your coin box.

2. INVISIBLE : Collect this Invisible power and be a invisible man on game and run without any obstacles for 10 secs.

3. STAR POWER : Collect this star and add more extra 2 points in your coin box.

4. MAGNET : Collect this power and attract all coins towards your coin box.

5. BOOST ENERGY : After getting this power character will get energy and run fast for 500 meters.


FEATURES :

* Easy to play.

* Total 11 stages & 4 Levels.

* Having Beautiful graphics & sound also.

* After every end of game easy to share score on GameCenter & Facebook also.

* Collect coins and purchase powers for play.

* No ads in the game.

Like "The Den Run" on Facebook :
https://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Den-Run/511154162264840
